title: Unlocking the COP28 climate agenda in G10 economies: Do environmental taxes and environmentally-related technologies matter in the natural resource-load capacity factor connection?
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Sustainable Futures, Volume 8

Author(s): Mohammed Musah, Isaac Ahakwa, Simplice A. Asongu, Michael Owusu-Akomeah, George Oppong Appiagyei Ampong
